headline: It's a small world: Why payment companies are targeting SMBs
summary: Micro-, small- and medium-sized businesses have traditionally been a tough nut to crack when it comes to serving up actionable insights. Payment data is helping to change that.

raw.headline: It's a small world: Why payment companies are targeting SMBs
raw.summary: Micro-, small- and medium-sized businesses have traditionally been a tough nut to crack when it comes to serving up actionable insights. Payment data is helping to change that.

headline: Unzer and Mastercard enter payments partnership
summary: This collaboration seeks to create a unified digital payment ecosystem, leveraging Mastercard's open banking-driven solutions.

headline: The Turkish Competition Authority Investigates Visa And Mastercard For Alleged Exclusionary Practices
summary: The Turkish Competition Authority has launched a comprehensive investigation into Visa and Mastercard, focusing on alleged exclusionary practices in Turkey's card scheme and digital wallet services...

headline: Should You Buy Mastercard While It's Below $530?
summary: There are exceptions, though, and payment card giant Mastercard (NYSE: MA) is one of the very few.  Mastercard's fame comes from its ubiquity as the No. 2 payment card brand (behind leader Visa) on the planet.  Millions of Americans have at least one Mastercard credit or debit card in their possession, and this monster presence makes the company powerful and important.

headline: Invesco Global Focus Fund Q3 2024 Commentary
